name: Tesla Design System 2022 (Plaid S)
description:
🗞 UPDATE: I've started a design bundle subscription where we send you at least 1 new premium design system every month + other assets. If you'd like to support us please consider joining here!


This design system is built around the 17" in car UI and infotainment system from the Tesla Model S (Plaid). It serves as a starting point for a more complete system.


The main screens covered are:

  • Navigation
  • Controls
  • Entertainment


🕹 I've also included prototypes and mock ups, including a fridge...


You can understand why in this YouTube video


- ✌️Izzy
